name: @7otion/orm
author: Burak Kartal
description: A simple database-agnostic ORM for TypeScript that supports tauri's sql plugin.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=cjs --minify --outfile=dist/index.js && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=esm --minify --outfile=dist/index.mjs
